import { useState } from "react" import { Form, Button, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap" import coastersService from "../../services/coasters.service" const NewCoasterForm = ({ closeModal, refreshList, setToastMessage, setShowToast }) => { const [coasterData, setCoasterData] = useState({ title: '', description: '', length: 0, inversions: 0, imageUrl: '' }) const handleInputChange = e => { const { name, value } = e.target setCoasterData({ ...coasterData, [name]: value }) } const handleFormSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() coastersService .saveCoaster(coasterData) .then(() => { closeModal() refreshList() setShowToast(true) setToastMessage('Monta침a rusa creada :)') }) .catch(err => console.error(err)) } const { title, description, length, inversions, imageUrl } = coasterData return (
Nombre Descripci칩n Inversiones Longitud Imagen (URL)
) } export default NewCoasterForm
